tool_description: Validates card expiry dates and checks if the card is currently valid or expired.
error_messages: Invalid month: Expiry month must be between 1 and 12.
Invalid year format: Expiry year must be a 4-digit year (e.g., 2024).
Card expired: The card has already expired based on the expiry date.
Invalid date format: Current date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format if provided.
usage: Provide expiry_month (1-12) and expiry_year (4-digit). Optionally provide current_date for custom comparison, otherwise uses system date.

is_valid.description: Whether the card is currently valid (not expired)

months_until_expiry.description: Number of months until expiry (negative if expired)
